Release.Changes:
Version 0.55.2:
- Fixed the program crashing when rapidly resetting videos.
- Improved reliability of SwSh dialog box detection. (reported by arnim1203)
- Increased SV shiny egg detection window to decrease chance of missed shiny. (reported by mathieuj75)

New Features:
- Added a beta program for farming SV mystery gifts by playing from game start to the first Pokemon center. Demo Video
- Added support for the Switch 2 C (GameChat) button for wired controllers.

Bug Fixes / QoL Improvements:
- Major fixes and stability improvements to AutoStory.
- AutoDA is now tolerant to nicknames and add-to-party being enabled.
- SV egg programs will ask you to check your Camera Support option if it can't find the basket.
- PLA programs that reset will tell you if it thinks you didn't save in Jubilife.
- Fixed Regigigas on Switch 2.
- Fixed date spam not working in German on Switch 2.
- Improved stability of ESP32 datespam.
- Reduce chance of false positive Tera rewards menu detection.
- Fixed Home Box Sorter not reading master balls.
- Fixed some Pok√©mon names not being correctly read in Chinese simplified due to name changes.
- Improved reliability of Y-COMM symbol detector.
- Fixed load profile not loading the resolution.
- Fixed some crashes.

Beta.Changes:
Version 0.54.24 (Release Candidate):

- Added partial support for the Switch 2 GR and GL buttons. All keyboard settings will be reset to default due to the button mappings shifting.
- Fixed Arduino/Teensy and ESP32-S3 controllers hanging if the Switch refuses the connection. New firmware will be needed.
- Fixed all PLA programs that navigate regions being broken. (regression in v0.54.12)
- The Home Box Sorter should recognize PLA balls now.
- Fixed SBB allowing joysticks to go diagonally out-of-bounds. (reported by Koi)
- Fixed a possible deadlock with SBB.
- Fixed an issue in the button scheduler where it may issue incorrect commands.
- Various stability improvements to CC itself.

PrivateBeta.Changes:
Version 0.54.6:
- Fixed incorrect detection user select on Switch 2. (reported by Zing)

Version 0.54.5:
- Improved detection of console type. (Switch 1 vs. Switch 2 international vs. Switch 2 Japan-locked) Most programs will be able to run without specifying the console type.
- Programs will now error out if the detected console type disagrees with the user selection.
- Fixed a serious issue with audio playback.
- Fixed various issues with the SV sandwich maker. (reported by babs)
- Improved reliability of Shaymin shiny hunt. (reported by .functionfrank)
- Improved reliability of LGPE legendary reset.
- Improved reliability of date-spam routines.
- Fixed SwSh Regi light corrections.
- Fixed LGPE gift reset not recovering from errors.
- Switch 2: Fixed update menu detection. It will now detect both firmware and game updates and bypass them.
